description:
The Japan Tournament begins. The Buddyfighters compete to be the first to reach 100 wins and qualify for the World Championship. Meanwhile, Tasuku fights to protect Bal and uncover Doctor Gara`s plans.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Here it Comes! WBC Cup Japan Tournament!
Kita Kitaaa! WBC Cup Nihon Taikai!!
キタキタァー! WBCカップ日本大会!!
